hero.title: Maximus
hero.subtitle: Platform Engineering | SRE | DevSecOps
hero.description: Architecting resilient, automated cloud platforms with a focus on GitOps workflows, DevSecOps integration, and scalable SRE principles. Specializing in high-availability distributed systems and MLOps at the edge.

about.bio: Hello! I'm Maximus, a Platform Engineer and SRE specialist focused on building robust, automated infrastructure. I thrive on solving complex distributed systems challenges and implementing GitOps workflows into every layer of the stack. My expertise spans Kubernetes orchestration (Talos, ArgoCD), multi-cloud automation (AWS, Azure), and engineering secure-by-default pipelines for both web and ML workloads.
about.educationText: Specialized education focused on Cloud/Platform Engineering and Cybersecurity, gaining expertise in network security, IaC automation, and enterprise-grade compliance.
about.ambitionsText: I am aiming to become a lead Platform Engineer/SRE, helping organizations build self-healing, automated, and secure cloud ecosystems from the ground up.
about.philosophy_1: I treat infrastructure not as a collection of resources, but as a live, self-healing software platform.
about.philosophy_3: principle—designing systems that maintain availability and integrity even under degraded operations.
about.trajectory: Currently deep-diving into GitOps for eBPF-powered Kubernetes clusters and implementing edge MLOps pipelines.
about.pageDescription: Technical profile of Maximus Mukiza, a specialist in Cloud Engineering, SRE, and DevSecOps with expertise in AWS, Azure, and automated infrastructure.
about.pageKeywords: Platform Engineer, SRE, DevOps, DevSecOps, MLOps, GitOps, Kubernetes, AWS, Azure, Maximus Mukiza

projects.pageTitle: Projects - Maximus Mukiza | Cloud Security Portfolio
projects.pageDescription: Explore Maximus Mukiza's infrastructure projects, including packet automation, SIEM stack creation, Azure Bicep configurations, AWS hosting, and IoT security solutions.
projects.heading: My Projects
projects.intro: Here are some of the key projects I've worked on throughout my career. Each project represents unique challenges and valuable learning experiences in the field of cybersecurity and cloud computing.
projects.lightboxNav: Use arrow keys to navigate between projects, ESC to close

p1.title: Secure Edge Node: Smart Parcel Ecosystem
p1.description: Distributed IoT architecture featuring secure inter-node communication, centralized state management, and containerized locker controllers.
p1.background: Designed a resilient locker management system with zero-trust principles, focusing on secure handshakes between distributed Raspberry Pi nodes and ESP32 controllers.
p1.realizations: Implemented a custom event-driven architecture for real-time locker updates and integrated hardware-level encryption for access tokens.
p1.learnings: Advanced knowledge in mutual TLS for IoT, distributed consensus for state synchronization, and secure boot fundamentals.

p2.title: React-Sec-Ops: Automated 3-Tier DevSecOps
p2.description: High-availability web platform on AWS emphasizing DevSecOps integration, automated CI/CD security scanning, and managed cloud infrastructure.
p2.background: Engineered a secure 3-tier architecture while navigating AWS Learner Lab IAM constraints, utilizing a hybrid IaC model for maximum automation.
p2.realizations: Automated ECS Fargate orchestration and Aurora RDS provisioning, with a fallback manual strategy for restricted IAM resources.
p2.learnings: Mastery of DevSecOps pipelines, automated secret management, and elastic infrastructure scaling.

p3.title: Azure Platform: Modular Bicep-Flex
p3.description: Highly modular Infrastructure as Code (IaC) framework for Azure, featuring automated compliance checks and standardized security benchmarks.
p3.background: Designed reusable Bicep modules to accelerate enterprise deployments while enforcing zero-trust policies throughout the resource lifecycle.
p3.realizations: Created automated validation pipelines for Bicep templates, ensuring 100% compliance with Azure Security Benchmark v3.
p3.learnings: Gained expertise in Azure Policy as Code, modular IaC design patterns, and automated resource governance.

p5.title: Edge MLOps: AI-Driven Smart Bridge Control
p5.description: Enterprise-grade IoT infrastructure automating maritime traffic via edge-deployed ML models, sound classification, and computer vision.
p5.background: Engineered a production-ready ML pipeline for real-time sensor fusion at the edge, optimizing bridge operations through automated decision-making.
p5.realizations: Architected a multi-modal inference engine with hybrid audio-visual processing, integrated into an automated CI/CD pipeline for model updates.
p5.learnings: Expertise in model quantisation for edge devices, streaming telemetry with OpenTelemetry, and containerized ML workloads.

p6.title: Terra-Multi-Cloud: AWS & Azure Orchestration
p6.description: Cross-provider infrastructure automation using Terraform to deploy a resilient multi-cloud application across AWS and Azure.
p6.background: Built a unified deployment pipeline that provisions Azure Container Apps and AWS ASG/ALB, highlighting cross-cloud networking and API discovery.
p6.realizations: Automated Docker build/push to ACR, dynamic service discovery across providers, and unified state management.
p6.learnings: Mastered multi-cloud networking, provider-abstracted IaC, and complex CI/CD orchestration.

p7.title: Hybrid Cloud Platform: GitOps & Talos Linux
p7.description: Enterprise-grade Kubernetes foundation built on immutable Talos Linux and managed via ArgoCD, featuring eBPF-powered networking and replicated NVMe storage.
p7.background: Architected a self-healing, GitOps-driven platform from metal/VM to application layer, emphasizing zero-touch operations and high availability.
p7.realizations: Integrated Cilium eBPF for secure networking, Mayastor for distributed NVMe storage, and Garage S3 for object storage redundancy.
p7.learnings: Expertise in GitOps (ArgoCD), immutable OS management, eBPF visibility, and SRE monitoring stacks.

p8.title: SRE Challenge: BookStack AWS Deployment
p8.description: High-availability, production-hardened deployment of BookStack on AWS using Pulumi (Python) and GitLab CI/CD with focus on observability and disaster recovery.
p8.context: Infrastructured as Code & SRE Best Practices
p8.background: Engineered a resilient documentation platform on ECS Fargate, focusing on automated recovery, secrets management, and performance monitoring.
p8.realizations: Implemented full CI/CD with multi-stage builds, automated backup strategies, and integrated security scanning.
p8.learnings: Collaborative SRE practices, advanced Pulumi (Python) automation, and GitLab CI/CD for mission-critical apps.

cv.name: Maximus Mukiza
cv.profileBio1: Focused Cloud & Cybersecurity professional specializing in Infrastructure as Code, security automation, and resilient cloud architecture.
cv.profileBio2: Combines hands-on experience with Azure, AWS, and SOC tools (Wazuh, Graylog) with a passion for building secure, automated cloud infrastructure.
cv.profileBio3: Dedicated to operational excellence and proactive security, implementing real-world solutions in distributed cloud environments.
cv.educationDegree1: Professional Bachelor, Cloud and Cyber Security
cv.educationUniversity1: Thomas More University of Applied Sciences
cv.work1Detail1: Developed 20+ personalized training plans; coached clients with a focus on safety and results.
cv.work1Detail2: Promoted and sold memberships — contributing to revenue growth.
cv.work1Detail3: First point of contact for questions: practiced clear, solution-oriented communication.
cv.work2Detail1: Processed and tracked ~800 delivery orders/week via Excel; improved data organization and reduced errors.
cv.work2Detail2: Supported customers via email and resolved service requests — strong focus on customer satisfaction.
cv.work2Detail3: Collaborated with logistics and sales: developed insight into business processes and data flow.
cv.work3Detail1: Redesigned the sales website: improved navigation and user experience (UX).
cv.work3Detail2: Created and edited product photos; ensured a consistent digital appearance.
cv.work3Detail3: Worked in a multidisciplinary team — strengthened communication and adaptability.
